#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
int main()
{
    long long int t,n,m,k,ans;
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%lld %lld %lld",&n,&k,&m);
        ans=0;
        while(n<=(m/k))
        {
            ans++;
            n=n*k;
        }
        printf("%lld\n",ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
